Class CompanySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompanySystem

  • public class CompanySystem
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents the automation system of the a company. It also stores the stores, admins, customers, employees of the company. Admins, employees and customers can use it for different purposes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompanySystem()
      Constructor that sets the stores, admins, employees, customers and the supply list of a company.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompanySystem

        public CompanySystem()
        Constructor that sets the stores, admins, employees, customers and the supply list of a company. If this company is created for the first time, it automaticaly creates 4 branches, 1 online store. Reads the stores, admins, employees, customers and the supply list information from their files and sets them.

    • Method Detail

      • getLoggedInStatus

        public java.lang.String getLoggedInStatus()
        Returns:
        the loggedInStatus. Logged in status is determined according to who is using the system. Can be admin, employee or customer.

      • getStoreAmount

        public int getStoreAmount()
        Returns:
        the amount of stores the company has.

      • getSupplyAmount

        public int getSupplyAmount()
        Returns:
        the amount of supplies listed in the Supply List.

      • getSupplyList

        public Product getSupplyList(int index)
                      throws InvalidIndex
        Parameters:
        index - will be the index of the supply that will be returned from the SupplyList. It cannot be smaller than 0 or bigger than the supply amount.
        Returns:
        the supply at the given index from the SupplyList.
        Throws:
        InvalidIndex - if the index does not meet the requirements.

      • getStore

        public Store getStore(int index)
               throws InvalidIndex
        Parameters:
        index - will be the index of the store that will be returned from the StoreList. It cannot be smaller than 0 or bigger than the store amount.
        Returns:
        the store at the given index from the StoreList.
        Throws:
        InvalidIndex - if the index does not meet the requirements.

      • getCustomerAmount

        public int getCustomerAmount()
        Returns:
        the amount of customers

      • getCustomer

        public Customer getCustomer(int index)
                     throws InvalidIndex
        Parameters:
        index - will be the index of the customer that will be returned from the CustomerList. It cannot be smaller than 0 or bigger than the customer amount.
        Returns:
        the customer at the given index from the CustomerList.
        Throws:
        InvalidIndex - if the index does not meet the requirements.

      • enterSystem

        public void enterSystem()
        Logs into the system with the given user information. This method is to determine who is using the system and with the proper informations. If the user was registered from before but trying to enter the system with wrong information, the information will be asked again. The things that a user changes according to if they are admin, employee or a customer. Saves the email and the status(admin/costumer/employee) of the user who logs in. If the user was not registered from before, registers the user as a new customer.

      • makeSale

        public void makeSale(int no)
        Makes a sale for a customer who comes to a branch and wants to make a purchase. The purchase can be made from a branch only, online store does not count. If the product is in the stock of the store, the purchase is done instantly. If not, it is registered as a new order for the customer. Used by the branch employees.
        Parameters:
        no - is the number of the customer that will make a purchase.

      • shopMenu

        public void shopMenu()
        Makes a purchase for the customer who is logged in. The purchase can be made from a branch or the online store. If the product is in the stock of the store, the purchase is done instantly if the store is a branch. If the store is the online store, then the purchase is added as a new order. If the product is not in the stock of the store, it is asked to order from another store or the purchase is added as a new order.

      • salesMenu

        public void salesMenu()
        Arranges all the sales. If the product is in the stock, decreases the stock, changes the new order as a past order to show the purchase is done If the product is not in the stock, adds the product to the supply list to be able to supply it. Used by the branch employees.

      • storeAdmin

        public void storeAdmin(Admin addedAdmin)
        Adds admins to the Admins array.
        Parameters:
        addedAdmin - is an admin that will be added to the Admins array.

      • printSupplyList

        public void printSupplyList()

      • addBranch

        public void addBranch(Store addedBranch)
        Adds a new branch to the company. Increments the branch count in the BranchCount.txt
        Parameters:
        addedBranch - is the branch that will be added to the company.

      • removeBranch

        public void removeBranch(int branchNo)
                  throws InvalidIndex
        Removes a branch from the StoreList. Decreases the branch count from the BranchCount.txt. Changes all the other branchs' numbers according to the new branch count. If there was a new/past order from this store, sets them as if they were/will be done from the online store not to affect the customers' orders. Resets the SupplyList.
        Parameters:
        branchNo - is the index of the branch that will be removed from the company.
        Throws:
        InvalidIndex - if the branchNo does not meet the requirements.

      • querySupplyList

        public void querySupplyList()
        Shows if there are any products that need to be supplied.

      • printAllProducts

        public void printAllProducts()
        Prints out all the products this company produces.

      • searchProduct

        public void searchProduct(Product searchedProduct)
        Serachs for a product in the stock of all the stores the company has.
        Parameters:
        searchedProduct - is the product that will be searched in the stocks of the all stores.

      • seePastOrders

        public void seePastOrders()
        Shows the past orders of the customer who is logged in.

        Parameters:
